productsList.productSubtitle: Allows you to use our data
productsList.productDescription:
With our API, you can access COVID data, including for 3000+ USA counties in a machine readable format, made for programmatic consumption by other websites, models, and tools.

> Notes
>
> V1 of our API will be deprecated on October 5, 2020. See our migration instructions. 
>
> Our API is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution - NonCommercial - NoDerivatives 4.0 International. Learn more about our license for both commercial and non-commercial users.
